title: Star Wars Book of Boba Fett Episodes 1 & 2 Review
description:
Go to http://upstart.com/kindafunny to find out how Upstart can lower your monthly rate.

Tim, Barrett, and Anthony Carboni give their thoughts on the latest Disney Plus Star Wars show featuring everyone's favorite Mandalorian.
